sentences.english: Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
sentences.chinese: 受到大霧影響而停飛的班機已全部復航。

sentences.english: All aircraft at London Airport were grounded by fog yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天由於大霧倫敦機場所有飛機停飛。

sentences.english: Planes are often weathered in  during the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雨期間飛機常常停飛。

sentences.english: All the planes were socked in yesterday because of the thick mist.
sentences.chinese: 由於霧大，昨天所有的飛機都停飛了。

sentences.english: Much of Europe's air traffic was grounded last month because of ash from an erupting volcano under the Eyjafjallajokull glacier in Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 受冰島火山灰影響，歐洲多數航班上月被迫停飛。

sentences.english: Germany's high-speed rail network has put paid to short-haul flights between several cities.
sentences.chinese: 德國的高速鐵路網已經使短程的城市間航班停飛。

sentences.english: The plane was grounded by fog yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天那架飛機因霧停飛。

sentences.english: The storm grounded army rescue helicopters for at least two days.
sentences.chinese: 惡劣的天氣迫使軍隊救援直升飛機停飛了至少兩天。

sentences.english: Anti-government demonstrators swarmed to international airport, putting a stop to departing flights.
sentences.chinese: 反政府的示威者聚集在國際機場，致使所有航班停飛。

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
